solution_line_template: It will take Sheena {hours_per_dress} hours x {num_bridesmaids} bridesmaids = <<{hours_per_dress}*{num_bridesmaids}={total_hours_needed}>>{total_hours_needed} hours to sew the dresses.
It will take her {total_hours_needed} hours / {hours_per_week} hours = <<{total_hours_needed}/{hours_per_week}={total_weeks}>>{total_weeks} weeks.
